name: mech island escape
description:
basic prototype for my simple game concept - You are trying to escape the war. Your ship is shot down and crashes on a small island. There you find the wreckage of a previous battle, perhaps you can repurpose some of these parts to survive ...

Notes:
currently incomplete but most of it is done

  • missing a few more models (one more mech part and main mech - currently placeholders)
  • a few more art assets & effects
  • simple animation
  • tried to incorporate jam sub themes of water & reverse engineering

controls 

WASD to move, E to interact, space to use jetpack, left shift for sprint, escape to close

assets used -

  • various megascan textures & quixel bridge models/smart materials for landscape, props and plants
  • a stock soundFX from freesound.org 
  • a blueprint from unreal engine content example 
  • ship mesh from quixel bridge tutorial - video tutorial
